# Google doc #
## What is google docs ##
Google docs is a free Web-based application in which documents and spreadsheets can be created, edited and stored online.
## How to use google docs ##
1. Go to google chrome
2. Input google doc in the google chrome:![screenshot 2017-05-30 at 2 25 06 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/28161368/26598640/c426b6a6-452a-11e7-8b8a-e4cb030a038b.png)
3. click on google docs
![screenshot 2017-05-30 at 2 27 37 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/28161368/26598758/2310cee0-452b-11e7-8a83-561416c090cc.png)
4. Here is the landing page of Google drive 
![screenshot 2017-05-30 at 2 30 30 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/28161368/26598941/aa1b45e6-452b-11e7-9ae7-c606f611c4ce.png)
5. you can start a new document by add a new page
